ABOUT

Iqra National University is recognized by HEC (Higher Education Commission), authorized by PEC (Pakistan Engineering Council) and chartered by Government of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa. University, for its repute, faculty, and unique academic curriculum, attracts a large number of students every year, although it offers admission to a measured number of students from all regions of the country.The university currently enrolls 4,000 students in different disciplines with 10,000 alumni. And has a standing reputation among the people of Peshawar. The university provides an academic friendly environment with high standard services like well-equipped classrooms, advanced computer laboratories with 24 hour internet facilities and rich Information Resource Center. Moreover the university provides sports and leisure facilities, from tennis court to swimming pool, cricket and football grounds, and indoor table tennis. INU has several active societies; -INU Sports Society -INU Music Society -INU Debate Society -INU Dramatic Society -TEDxINU -ASCE (American Society of CIVIL Engineers) -IYDC (Iqra Youth Development Conference) - Khana-e-Fun ( Art & Design )
